review: I stayed at Walnut Hotel Kotdwara for one day while returning from my trip to Lansdowne. We were six persons, three adults and three children. We took their biggest room and were given two extra beds to accommodate all six of us in the same room. View from the room was nice giving mountain view. It is a newly built hotel which is situated in Kay Pride Mall. Hotel is situated at third floor and they also have a movie hall cineplex at 2nd floor. Lift facility was also present in the hotel. Parking space is provided in the mall basement. Rates of room with extra bed was fine just in the mid range. Food was provided by restaurant which was situated just outside the cinema hall on 2nd floor, which was cheap and very good but timings were from 9 AM to 9 PM only. Room service was just
name: sushilmavi
